invoice_title.reason: Large top-of-page header 'INVOICE' in big capital letters indicating document type; visually prominent header.

invoice_number.reason: Right-side invoice detail block labeled 'INVOICE NO:' followed by '01234'. Proximity to other invoice details (Date, Due Date) confirms this is the invoice identifier.

invoice_date.reason: Field labeled 'DATE:' with value '11.02.2030' in the invoice details block. Interpreted as day.month.year format (dots used), normalized to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) as 2030-02-11.

due_date.reason: Field labeled 'DUE DATE:' with value '11.03.2030' in invoice details. Interpreted as day.month.year (dots), normalized to 2030-03-11.

terms.reason: No explicit 'Terms' or 'Net X' label visible on the document. Only a due date is shown; no textual payment terms were detected.

currency.reason: Dollar sign '$' appears next to line totals and totals area (e.g., '$100', '$400', '$440'); currency inferred as US Dollars.

issuer.reason: No clear 'From', company name, or issuer block detected on the visible portion of the document. The left block is labeled 'ISSUED TO' (recipient), not the issuer.

bill_to.reason: Left-side block labeled 'ISSUED TO:' contains recipient name 'Richard Sanchez', company 'Thynk Unlimited' and address '123 Anywhere St., Any City'. No phone/email/website present in that block.

pay_to.reason: Block labeled 'PAY TO:' lists 'Borcele Bank', 'Account Name: Adeline Palmerston' and 'Account No.: 0123 4567 8901'. Account number normalized by removing spaces for a compact numeric form.

line_items.reason: Tabular item area with headers 'DESCRIPTION | UNIT PRICE | QTY | TOTAL' and six rows beneath. Each row shows unit price '100', quantity '1', and total shown as '$100'. Extracted descriptions from left-most column. Normalized numeric values (unit_price, quantity, amount) inferred from visible numbers and dollar signs.

subtotal.reason: Totals area shows a labeled 'SUBTOTAL' with value '$400' on the right side beneath the item table.

discount.reason: No 'Discount' or similar line observed in the totals area.

tax_amount.reason: Totals area shows 'Tax 10%' and the totals arithmetic indicates tax amount of $40 (displayed next to Tax or implied by the total). The document shows a 'Tax' label with '10%' and final total $440, consistent with $40 tax on a $400 subtotal.

tax_rate.reason: Tax line explicitly shows 'Tax 10%' in the totals area; normalized to decimal 0.10 for computational use.

total.reason: Totals area shows a prominent 'TOTAL' with value '$440' indicating final amount due after tax.

payment_instructions.value: Borcele Bank; Account Name: Adeline Palmerston; Account No.: 0123 4567 8901
payment_instructions.normalized_value: Borcele Bank; Account Name: Adeline Palmerston; Account No.: 012345678901
payment_instructions.reason: Payment block labeled 'PAY TO:' contains bank and account details; combined into a single instructions string. Account number normalized by removing spaces.

payment_terms_summary.reason: No explicit textual payment terms like 'Net 30' or similar present; only a due date is shown.

document_reference.reason: No auxiliary identifiers (page number, file name, or other reference) are visible on the provided document image.

notes.reason: No additional footnotes or notes text detected in the visible region of the invoice.

notes_on_extraction.value: There is a visual inconsistency: six line items each showing $100 would sum to $600, but the subtotal on the document is shown as $400 with Tax 10% = $40 and Total $440. The mapping records line-level values exactly as they appear and records the subtotal/tax/total values shown in the totals block. The discrepancy is noted here and should be reconciled against source data if needed.
notes_on_extraction.reason: Explains observed mismatch between item row sums and displayed subtotal.
